-----Original Message-----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, May 20, 1999 2:47 PM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Any local necromancer?


>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>Hmm, seem like no one is training necromancer. I'm thinking of training
>one once my wiz hit lvl 8.
>
>Anyone play around 9pm-12am midnight in Faydark? I'm having a hard time
>getting trust-worthy buddies (team with a lvl 5 dwraven cleric 2 nights ago
>and he only know how to heal himself, died 4 times in a row and lost a bar
>of XP before I disband, sigh). So far from experience I can team pretty
>well with lvl 7-9 cleric or ranger, coz they can tank and heal while I keep
>blasting from the side.
>
>Btw, any one play gnome? I'm thinking of making a gnome necromancer. This
>race comes with special ability "improving tinkering", wonder what this
>skill does. Appreciate all advice on gnome and necromancer. Thx!
>
>Zilred, Human Enchanter
>Ziltus, High-elf Wizard
>Zilone, Gnome Necromancer (see the 'lone' in my name? destinated to be
>lonely, ie solo, hehe)
